subject: Adobe Creative Suite 3 Design
body:
How often things occur by mere chance which we dared not even hope for.
Criticism is the disapproval of people, not for having faults, but having faults different from your own.
Most works of art, like most wines, ought to be consumed in the district of their fabrication.
Advice is what we ask for when we already know the answer but wish we didn't.
There is no good in arguing with the inevitable. The only argument available with an east wind is to put on your overcoat.
Keep your heart right, even when it is sorely wounded.
A man never discloses his own character so clearly as when he describes another s.
There are two perfectly good men, one dead, and the other unborn.
Obviously, the answer to oil spills is to paper-train the tankers.
I am not concerned that I am not known, I seek to be worthy to be known.
Perfect courage is to do without witnesses what one would be capable of doing with the world looking on.
The human race afraid of nothing, rushes on through every crime.
If you aren't fired up with enthusiasm, you'll be fired with enthusiasm.
If you are content, you have enough to live comfortably.
Candor is the brightest gem of criticism.
Until the day of his death, no man can be sure of his courage.
When somebody gives you a sexy look, you know they're trying. It's terrible! But when you smile, it's so much sexier!
Of all vices, drinking is the most incompatible with greatness.
Let no man under value the price of a virtuous woman's counsel.
